    • Method Detail

      • getShot

        public int[] getShot()
        This method takes in the shot coordinates in the form A1 and returns them in array reference for i.e. 0,0
        Returns:
        returns an array with the 2 grid coordinates to fire the shot

      • validShot

        public boolean validShot(int row,
                         int col)
        This method checks if the shot chosen is a valid choice
        Parameters:
        row - row of grid location from the user to fire the shots
        col - col of grid location from user to fire
        Returns:
        boolean true or false depending on if the shot is valid

      • shotsFired

        public boolean shotsFired(int[] returnCoordinates)
        This method fires the shot and changes the relevent information on the grid.
        Parameters:
        returnCoordinates - This contains the shot coordinates
        Returns:
        hit whether it was a hit or not

        public void shipSunk(int num)

        Parameters:

      • gameOver

        public boolean gameOver()
        Checks if all the ships are sunk and if the game is over
        Returns:
